001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters;
002
003/**
004 * Defines a contract for dynamically generating test data within the framework.
005 *
006 * <p>Implementations of this interface serve as structured data providers, ensuring
007 * consistent and reusable test data generation.
008 *
009 * <p>The data creation process is managed through a {@link Late} instance,
010 * allowing deferred initialization until the data is explicitly needed.
011 * Additionally, implementations provide an enumeration reference
012 * that identifies the specific data model.
013 *
014 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate ğŸ’ğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»
015 */
016public interface DataForge<T extends Enum<T>> {
017
018   /**
019    * Provides a deferred test data creation mechanism.
020    *
021    * <p>Implementations return a {@link Late} instance that generates the
022    * test data object when required. This allows for on-demand data creation
023    * rather than instantiating all test data at the start.
024    *
025    * @return A {@link Late} instance responsible for creating test data objects.
026    */
027   Late<Object> dataCreator();
028
029   /**
030    * Returns the enumeration instance associated with the test data model.
031    *
032    * <p>This method ensures that test data can be uniquely identified and retrieved
033    * in a structured manner using its corresponding enum representation.
034    *
035    * @return An {@link Enum} instance representing the test data definition.
036    */
037   T enumImpl();
038
039}
